entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • get the route name given an http method & uri #48034
  • Fix System.Security.Cryptography.Xml dependency #48033
  • Ability to run Blazor Server and WebAssembly components side-by-side in the same document #48032
    8.0-preview5
  • Bootstrap Behaviour Not working properly #48028
  • SignalR C++ Client Static Lib #48027
  • Output Cache doesn't work when user has Cookie Authentication cookies #48025
  • Submit InputTextArea with Enter keyword #48021
  • Authorization FallbackPolicy - requirements not evaluated #48019
  • Perf regression: caching, updates #48018

Closed

  • CA1512 build error when building aspnetcore with latest SDK version #47673
  • Deploy Blazor WASM on Linux Azure App Service #47737
  • SHA3 implement #48020
  • Minor grammar mistake in AuthenticateResult class #48015

PullRequests

Created

  • Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps. #48024
    area-infrastructure
  • Skip AOT template tests on Linux, where they are known to fail. #48022
    area-mvc
  • Reproduce bug in CI #48017
    area-identity

Merged

  • Remove hardcoded System.Security.Cryptography.Xml version #48029
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/7.0] Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47811
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.4.0 -> 6.5.0) #47861
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.7
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b5fd99b` to `797b0ad` #48002
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.18
  • Update branding to 6.0.18 #48030
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.18
  • Update branding to 7.0.7 #48031
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.7
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `6caf299` to `ecc4e18` #48003
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.18
  • Update servicing milestones for June #47765
    blocked, area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b5fd99b` to `797b0ad` #48004
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.6
  • Update selenium dependencies #48023
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.5.23228.7 #48026
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add MediaTypeHeaderValue.ParseList overload accepting IList<StringSegment> #48035
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Use the DisplayName and Display attributes to obtain the display name of a property #47993
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [release/6.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.2.3 -> 6.5.0) #47860
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47949
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47950
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Resolve CA2201: No Reserved Exceptions #47873
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime
